title: Basic functionality tests
description: Let's add some basic unit tests to ensure that the plugin is working as expected

title: Create and push to remote repo on github.com
description: Add rhydlewis/BeancountAutocomplete as a manual task

title: Script to locally deploy plugin
description: we need a way to deploy the latest version of the plugin to '~/Library/Application Support/Sublime Text/Packages/User/beancount_autocomplete.py'

title: Create README.md file that explains how to use the plugin
description: Create a short README.md file that explains how this plugin works, how to install etc. Make sure we specify how to set the `beancount_file` path. Look for other SublimeText plugins as a guide for what to include in this file.

title: Beancount autocomplete triggers for non Beancount files
description: In a markdown file, type `<` and the Beancount autocomplete picker appears. That shouldn't happen

title: Update script to ignore closed accounts
description: Currently the autocomplete script will suggest all accounts found in the beancount file. We need to update the script so that it filters out any closed accounts

title: Setup Semantic Versioning (Tags)
description: Package Control identifies new versions by looking at **Git Tags**. We will need to run `git tag -a v1.0.0 -m Initial

title: Submit to the Package Control Channel
